id.description: The ID of the board section

board_id.description: The ID of the board associated with the section

section_id.description: The ID of the section associated with the board

position.description: The position ID of the board section

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the board section

created_at.description: The date and time when the board section was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the board section was last updated

workspace_id.description: The ID of the workspace the board belongs to

admin_id.description: The ID of the admin of the board

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the board

created_at.description: The date and time when the board was created

type.description: The type of the section. 0 for Default, 1 for Custom.

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the section

created_at.description: The date and time when the section was created
The date and time when the user was created

id.description: The ID of the team member

team_id.description: The ID of the team associated with the member

user_id.description: The ID of the user associated with the member

created_at.description: The date and time when the team member was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the team member was last updated

email.description: The email address of the user

created_at.description: The date and time when the user was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the user was last updated

admin_id.description: The ID of the admin user of the workspace

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the workspace

created_at.description: The date and time when the workspace was created

id.description: The ID of the workspace member

workspace_id.description: The ID of the workspace associated with the member

user_id.description: The ID of the user associated with the member

created_at.description: The date and time when the workspace member was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the workspace member was last updated
